div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die mensis
Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes grige quitus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis cullane prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio thome Wobstar

The saide day the ballieis assignit the ferd' day of the monetht of August
next to cum to Johne horne tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne
of mydiltone for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of vxx woll skinnis

The saide day the ballieis assignit monunday that next cumys tile Alexander
Prat tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be William of Kyntor for
the wranguis' withhaldin of tua merkis of maile and Nonfreithing' and
releuing of him of the saide tua merkis at the handis of Williame Colpe
and Dauy colp his sone tutor tile Isabele of buchan

add.foreign: continuacio actionia A bavne et mariote Walcar'

div.p:
The said' day the actioun' depending betuix Androw bavne and marioun' Walcar'
with consent of thomas leslie ane of the balyeis of the saide burghe and forspekar
for the saide marioun' Is continevit to Sanct James evin nixt to cum in hoip
of concord' but preiudice tile ony partij

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die Julij
anno quo supra

The saide day Androw Cullane oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to James Colison'
that he sale proces' Johne farlie and caus' him be cursit as contumax' be this day
viij dais or ellis present him to the balyeis and officiaris of this burghe' within the tolbutht
within the said' terme to Ansuer' to James colison' and mak him pament of certane skinnis
aving to him and of ane Amerciament for the forstalling of the burghe In the quhilkis he
was conuictit

The saide day Johne patirsone tuk to preiwe one thurisday the ferde day
of Julij Instant befor the ballieis that Dauy bryde tuk ane butht fra
him in the nethirkirkgat for ane yer'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio burgi de Abirdene xxviijo
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicioni Curie quod Johannes chamer est legittimus et
propinquior heres quondam Alexandri chamer patris suj

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday the xviij day of August
nixt to Cum to Elizibetht setone to produce and schewe befor thame hir'
evidencis of the coniunctfeftment of the forland' clamit be hir' pertening
tile vmquhile James leslie hir' spous' Ande tile ansuer' for the gudis
of airschip pertening tile Dauy leslie sone to the saide James

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die Augusti
anno quo supra

The saide day Johne borne lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne of mydiltone for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of vxx wole skinnis tharfor the balyeis chargit William
scrimgeor officiar' to take ane distres' of the saide Johne hornis and lat it agan
to borghe and it be askit and warne him to this day xv dais as secunde
day of proces'

The saide day the borghe' fundin one Sandy blinsele be Johne mydile
tone for the wranguis' Intrometting with demi last querd of Salmonde was continevit
be ane Suorne assis' Dauid mar' forspekar quhile friday that next Cumis that
mastiris of the cavile conuenit et cetera

Eodem die Alexander gothtray conuictus fuit per asissam Juratam ex ore Dauid mar' prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbacio Roberti gray et cetera et Soluet eidem ij s' pro emenda Et
Idem Robertus fuir pro perturbio dicti alexandri et cetera et quilibet emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Androw stevinsone accusit be ansuer' to the borghe' fundin
one him be Alexander Prat for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xiij s' g'
denyit the saide borghe' Offering him redy tile vndirle deliuerance
of ane assis' and the saide Alexander disassentit that the saide borghe sulde
pas' to the decisione of ane assis' tharfor the saide Androw protestit to be
quyt of his challance tharof in tyme to Cum

The saide day Syme ellon' lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer to the wif of Johne ramsay for the wranguis' haldin fra hir'
of demi barell Salmonde tharfor the balyeis ordanit the Officiaris to warne him to
Comper' one friday that nixt cumis tile ansuer In the premiss'

The said day mathou branche oblist hyme be the faitht of his bodie
to stande and Abide at the ordinance ande deliuerance of the counsaile of
his awin fre wile and motiwe Anent the offence done to ser Johne stirueling
quhilk dependit in the spirituale lawe ande at the instance of alexander men
yeis Johne of cullan and vtheris the saide ser Johne was content It was
referrit to the saide counsale quhilkis riplie auisit the allegacionis
ande resonis of baitht the saide partiis harde and vnderstande deliuerit and orda
nit the saide mathou to ask the balyeis forgifnes for the offence commit
tit in the court ande to mak faitht and suer the gret aithe that he spak
neuere nor thocht that the saide sere hede done ony wrang in the making
of act follouit one him in this court and the spirituale court Ande that
the saide act is leile and treue in ale ponntis Ande that the saide sere Johne
Is ane leile trewe famous' man and notor in al his dowingis Item
Ordanit the saide mathoue to besek the consale to mak instance to the said'
sere Johne to ramyt him the said offence Ande sit one his kneis ane ask the
saide ser Johne forgefnes Ande thareftor the sadi mathou deponit the gret aitht
that the saide sere Johne was leile faithfule and trewe man and notor in ale his
dowingis Ande hed med the said act Ande ale ponntis contenit in It Ande that
the saide was leile and treue in ale ponntis contenit in It Alsua the said
mathou askit the saide bailyeis and notar forgefnes and fulfillit ale ponntis be
for writin Alsua thai ordanit the said mathou to pay ane stane of wax
to the haly blude licht at the wile of the saide sere Johne Alsua thai ordanit
the saide mathou to pay tuentj pundis scottis money to sanct nicholes
wark vnforgewin giwe euere he makis ony office to the said' ser Johne
in tim to cum Ande to pay to the saide sere Johne vj s' ij d' for the expensis
maide in the said' matir Ita fuit ut prefertur teste me Andrea
craufurd notario publico hic subscribenti sub meo signo manuali
Andreas craufurd

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die au
gustj anno quo supra

The said day the borgh fundin be Johne of cullan one patry Reid' for the
wranguis' withhalding fra him of ane key of the loft dur of the land'
quhilk androu steuart Inhabitis et cetera was fundin of nan' awaile
be ane suorn' assis' thomas Wod' forspekar

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis to Androw murray to prewie
the maser and the spwnis and ane brassin pot clamyt and persewit be him his own propir gudis
beang in the handis of Dauid steuart Ande assignit the officiaris to pas with
the saide androu to warne' the spous' of the saide Dauid to compeir the said'
day and heir the said' prewis suorn' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo mensis augusti
anno quo supra

head.add: Johannes vrchar' alias talyour in futy

div.p:
Eodem die Johanes talyour alisa vrchar' in futy conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Dauid mar' prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio thome bryame et vxoris sue et habentj quiti
de perturbio eius quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt Insuper diliberatus fuit
per assisam si Idem Johannes tale terminum in postrum commiserit et inde counuictus fuit
expelletur de burgo

The saide day Thomas chamer follouit marioun' mathesone his gude modir
for part of gudis of airschipe pertening to him be deces' of vmquhile Alexander
Chamer his fadir contening in ane bile producit and Rede in Jugement quhilkis
the saide marione be hir and Alexander Rede hir forspekar denyit Ande the said'
thomas tuk to preiwe the said' gudis perempturlie on' monunday eftir
the fest of Assumptioun of our lady nixt hereftir follouing befor the saide
balyeis within the said' burghe

add.foreign: probacio ducto per Andream murray de bonis suis

div.p:
The said' day patry Rede be his aithe deponit that the four' Siluere spvnis maser
of Siluer gilt with gold' and brokin with the mekile brassin pot fundin in the
hous' quhar Johne of lummysden' duelt nowe being in the handis of
Dauy stevart Is propir gudis tile Androw murray burges of Abirdene
Johne of murray be his aithe concordis with the said' deposicioun'
Johannes Waus ad Idem
Johannes murray ad Idem
Symon' elloun' ad Idem

The said' day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for
dome that Androu murray hed' Sufficientlie preuit the four Siluere
spvnis ane brokin maser of Siluere gilt and ane gret brassin pott fundin
in the hous' of Johne of lummysdovn' and nowe being in the handis of Dauy
Steuart ane of the balyeis of the said' burghe' was the said' Androwis

The said' day It was fundin be ane suorne assis' Dauy menyeis forspekar
that Syme elloun' awe to pay the wif of Johne Ramsay demi barrele of
Salmond' for the wranguis' haldin of the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament
of the Court and was chargit to pay the saide demi barell salmond' within terme
of lawe

Eodem die Johannes mar' conuictus fuit per asisam Juratam ex ore mathei
branche prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Alexandrum horne et Idem Alexander counictus fuit
pro perturbio dicti Johannis et quilibet alteri emendabit in Jura volunt In super
diliberatum fuit per dictum assisam quod si aliquis eorum alterum perturbauerit
In postrum soluet xx s' fabrice ecclesie beati nicholaij

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday the xxv day of this Instant monetht
of August to gilbert paule tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be patry leslie for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of j barrel Salmond' and j barrel of girls' to gude estimacion'

Curia balliuorum burgi per de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy bride allegit and tuk to preiwe the the hous' deba
tabile betuix him and Johne patirson' was nocht Rede at Witsonday
at nowne and the balyeis assignit him this day viij dais to prewe
his saide allegeance

add.foreign: Thomas mortymer et sponsa Dauid stevart

div.p:
The said' day Thomas mortymer was conuict be ane suorne assis' Williame Wormet
forspekar for trubulance of Anny Retre spous' to Dauid stevart and Scho quyt
of ale trubulance of the said' thomas for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament
of the court et cetera and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum And' atour
It was deliuerit be the saide assis' that and euir the saide thomas trubulis the saide Agnes
In tyme to cum and beis counict tharof or ony vthir famous' sicklik person' within this burghe
he sal pay xv s' to Sanct Nicholes werk vnforgevin In Recompens' of the offence

The saide day gilbert tulidef was in ane Amerciament of the court for trubulance of
Dauy Syme Ande the saide Dauy conuict' for trubulance of the said' gilbert
be ane suorne assis' William Wormet forspekar and Ilkan of thame in
ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and to Amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme
to Cum Nochtwithstanding the prouocacioun' of the said' trubulance was in the
saide gilbert

Curia balliuorum balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij
die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

add.foreign: continuacio actionis inter thomam Ridal Johannem Duncanson et Andream Kemintj

div.p:
The said' day sere Johne ruthirfurd entirit Jonhne Duncansone and Androw
Kennertj befor the balyeis tile vndirly the law Anent the clame of
strubuling of thome Ridale Ande thareftir the balyeis continevit the said'
actioun' quhile monunday that next cumis in siclike forme force and effect
as It is now Ande the saide sere Johne ruthirfurd come Souerte to
entir the saide Johne and Androw the said' monunday befor thame et cetera

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde miles deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue
ostendem quod thomas Ridale erit Indempnis pro Johanne Duncansone et Andrea
Kennertj aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannis mar' deuenit plegius legalis
per manus sue ostendum quod dictus Johannes et Andreas erunt Indempnes pro
dicto thoma aliter quam per viam Juris et dicte partes obligati fuerunt
ad conseruandum dictos suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione per
Manus suos et cetera

The saide day sere Jonhne Ruthirfurde Offerit him to mak his purgacioun
be his aithe that he was nothir art nor part nor wyst nocht of the
perseving of thome Ridale be Johne Duncanson' and Androw Kennertj And'
atour' he offerit him tile vndirlie the decisioun' of ane assis' tharuntile

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin one Jonet litstar be Walter houysone for the wrang
wys' Ressat of his fysche was fundin of nayne availe be ane suorne assis'
thomas chamer forspekar becaus' the saide borghe' was vncertand' Ande scho
quyt of his challance as the said' borghe' was fundin et cetera Ande the saide
Walter was in ane Amerciament of the Court

The sadie day Alexander Rede forspekar for Alexander malisone Requirit the balyeis to
tak lawe borrouis of Johne falconare that the saide Alexander malysone suld' be skathtles
of him alewais bot as the cours' of law will

The said' day Williame of buchane baxtar grantit him avand to Androw murray
for thome of buchane his brothir ane barrele of Salmond' quhilk he suld'
pay or ger' pay within terme of law

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Walter houyson' forspekar
that Dauy treys suld' pay to Johne pipar and his fallow ane day expens' and wage
of the yer' bigane
The said' day Dauy bride grauntit he tuk ane butht fra Johne patirsone

The said' day Cristy prat oblist and grantit him to entir William Duncane befor the
balyeis within the tolbutht of this burghe the xiiij day of the monetht of september
next to cum tile ansuer to Duncan Colisone William futhes or sere Androw smitht
or ony ane of thame In the thingis thai haue to say to him

The saide day the Court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin
for dome that Dauy bride hed sufficientlie preuit that the hous' quhilkis
Johne patirsone set to him was nocht Rede tile him at Witsonday in dewe
tyme

add.foreign: plegius pro Introitu Johannis Duncansone et Andree Kennertj

div.p:
The saide day Thome lousone come Souerte be his hande tile entir
Johne Duncansone Andro Kennertj befor the balyeis within the tolbutht of this burghe one
friday next eftir the cuming of my lorde of Abirdene Ande Johne pipar Come
Souerte tile entir Johne Duncansone the saide day befor the balyeis
within the said' tolbutht Ande the saidez Androw and Jonhne Oblist thame be
thar handis to freithe thar said' borrouis

The saide day Johne of mar' forspekar for thome Ridale disassentit that ony
Souerte was fundin tile entir Androw kennertj and Johne Duncanson' befor the
balyeis of this burghe' protestand that he mycht follow and persew thame befor
ony Juge or Jugis quhar' he mycht get Justice of thame

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day charlis smytht was conuict be ane suorne assis' patry Rede
forspekar for strubulance of Johne of fentone et cetera for the quhlkis he was in
ane amerciament of the court et cetera Ande for the Amendis to pay j li' of waxe to
S the haly blude licht Ande gif euere he offendis tile ony persoune in tym'
to cum and beis conuict tharof he sal pay xxti s' to Sanct nicholes werk
et cetera

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyeis forspekar
that for the offence done be Alexander malysone to Johne falconare in worde he
sale ask him forgiwnes Ande gif euere he offend' to the saide Johne in
tym' to Cum Ande beis conuict tharof he sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicho
les werk

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die
mensis Augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Duncanus snawe conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore thome
Wode prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis mar talyour Et Idem Johannes conuictus
fuit pro perturbio dicti Duncanj et cetera and quilibet aliter emendabit ut Jura
volunt

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis Augusti
anno quo supra

The said day William buchane baxtar gilbert tulidef Donalde baxtar thomas
Srathloche and Alexander findelaw baxtaris was conuict be ane Suorne assis'
Dauy menyeis forspekar for this brekin of the pas' / and for the selling of brede
or It was weyt / Ande for the wanting of breid' to serue the town' for the
quhilkis Ilkane of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court for Ilkan of the
said' thre pontis et cetera Ande to pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnfor
gevin et cetera Ande thar vnlawis to be modefeit and Set be the counsale and nayn
Refusit quhile thai direct thar entent and counsale tharapone

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the counsale that the four' ser
geandis sale pas' Ilkane Sonday with thar' Cunnaris suorne to thar office
Ilke man throw his avne quartar and tast assay and Set the ayle eftir the gudis
of the Samyn and price of the malt according to the law and statutis of the toune ande
nayn' aile derrar than viij s' the galloune And' Ilkan Settirday to pas'
with the suorne prisaris and pris' the flesche vndir the payn' of depriuacioun'
of thar office

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvto die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day William buchane gilbert tulidef Thome straloche Donald'
baxtar Alexander findelaw Richerde redhede Thome buchane Anny buchane and
Alexander Donaldson' was conuict be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar
for want of breid' of quhet to furnys' and Sustene the towne for the quhilkis
Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera to amend' as law wile
and forber' in tyme to cum

The said' day thir personis baxtaris was extent for thar amerciamentis In the quhilkis
thai war' conuict obefor' be the Counsale In the first Williame buchan'
v s' j li' wax to the halyblud licht / gilbert tulidef v s' and j li' wax
Thome straloche j li' wax Donald' baxtar ij s' and j li' waxe Sandy
findelaw ij s' and j li' waxe Richerde Redhed' ij s' j li' waxe thome
buchan demi li' waxe Canny buchan j li' waxe to the haly blud licht

The said' day cristy prat Alexander prat Robert flessour William Riburne
flessour Johne Riburne flessour Dauy Auchone Alexander lammyntone Wilyam
blitht Thome lammyntone and Syme flessour accusit for selling of
beyf or it was prisit and for Selling of flesche to skatt the towne
for Incompetent price Ande for selling of flesche derrar thane It was
prisit put thame in wile for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was
in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as lawe wile and forber'
In tyme to cum et cetera

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the Counsale that the flessouris
vsing the craft within this burghe sale Sele nay beyf flesche quhile
it be prisit nor sele It derrar' thane It is prisit Ande thai sale
Sele thar' mvtone for competent price be sicht of the Counsale
of the toune Ande gif ony of thame falyeis In ony pont befor
writin and beis conuict tharof sale pay viij s' for ane Amerciament of the court to
the balyeis and the price of the best that beis sauld vnprisit to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene vicesimo quinto die mensis Augusti anno Domini Millesimo
quingentesimo quinto coram honorabilis viris thoma Waus et patricio leslie duobus
balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedens per subscriptos videlicet
Dauid menyeis Alexandrum Rede Johannem Cullan gilbertum menyeis Johannem Colisone
Andream cullan Dauid blinsele Johannem Retre patricium Rede Johannem Willelmum
portar Alexandrum malysone Johannem arthour' et Johannem lowe burgenses dicti burgi Quj
jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid gledstane auus Johannis arduchochy latoris
presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis chamer ex boreali ex vna et torrentem
sancte trinitatis ex australi partibus ab altera et terram quondam Jacobi Kyntor versus
oriens et communionem vennellam versus occidens Et quod dictus Johannes est vnius de legittimis
et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Dauid aui sui de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod
est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum viginti
solidos et valuit xiij s' et iiijor d' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus
domini nostri Regis legittime per se ipsum ob decessum quondam dicti Dauid aui suj per dimidium
vnius annj erit eocirca In defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiuscumque
minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti balliuj et sigillis
quorundum qij huic Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day thomas lamyntoun' oblist him lauchfully to refund
ande pay to george smytht the costis ande the expensis maide of the bref
of Inquest of our Souerane lordis chapell rasit one the behalf of
Johnne smytht his sone Ande to bring him hame ane vthir bref
of Inquest of our Souerane lordis lordis chapell in siclik forme one
his expens' gif the said thomas ande georg accordis nocht be
tuix this ande the fest of michaelmes' nixt heireftir

The saide day tube blinseile grauntit to pay to Alexander
Prat four s' be tuix this ande the fest of Witsonday nixt
heireftir et cetera

The saide day Alane litster' gilbert litster' Androw litster' Johne lister'
and Williame scherar' litster' the gret bodelie aithe Suorne depoit
that ale the townis' of wad' merkit with the key quhilkis come to this burghe
fra hewe mertysone in the wer' Ilkane twne was war' xxxtj s'
gretis thane the towne of vthir wad that come

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die
mensis Augustj anno quo supra

The said' day marione of Kintor was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Johannes
Retre forspekar for trubulance of Dauy Kintor Ande the said' conuict for
strubulance of the saide marioun' his sistir Ilkan tile amende as lawe
wile and forber' in tyme Cum et cetera And' atour It was deliuerit be the saide
assis' gif ony of the said' pertiis trubulis and offendis vthir and beis conuict'
tharof thai sale pay xx s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne Ratre forspekar
that Dauy Kintor Is quyt of the quhit clatht and of the wranguis' Intrometting
of ane brassyne pott clamyt be marione' Kyntor his sistir

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne Ratre forspekar
that Dauy Kintor sale pay to marione Kintor his sistir ane bole of malt
of this newe Croipe for the clame of Certane lynt

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne Ratre forspekar
that Dauy Kintor sale preiwe one monunday that nixt cumis that he fande
William Watsonis hors' in his corne or skatht and that being preuit the borghe'
fundin one him be the saide William that wranguislie he hed' takin ane
hors' of his is of nayne availe Ande gif he falyeis in the saide prewe
the said' borghe' Is availe

Curia balliuorum balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo die
mensis Augusti Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Androw Johnesone quhitfischear' was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' Androw fyf forspekar for strubulance of gelis monrow and hurting of
him for the quhlkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and to Amend'
as law wile and forber' in tym to cum Ande anent the wranguis'
Cuttingis of the said' Androuis lyne clamit and follouit be him one the
said' geleys It was continevit be the saide assis' to friday that nixt
Cumis that mastiris of fische batis vnsuspect mycht be warnit to cum
and help to decid' quethir thar was wrang done or nocht in the Cutting
of the said' lyne Ande atour It was deliuerit and ordanit be the saide
assis' for the Amendis that the saide Androw Johneson' sale pay fourty
schillinigs tharof tuenty schillingis betuix this and alhallous day nixt hereftir
Ande vthir xx s' be yule next thareftir equaly betuix the saide
geleys and george barbour' that lechit and helyt the saide man to be distribuit
Ande gif euere ony of the saide partiis happinis tile offend tile vthir and
beis conuict tharof sale pay fiwe merkis to Sanct nicholes werk vnfor
gevin / batht the saide partiis being oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis
thar' handis vphaldin to stande and abid' at the deliuerance of the said'
assis' obefor

The said day Johne quereour' was conuict be ane suorne assis' Androw fyff
forspekar for strubulance of Johne mvnk for the quhilkis the saide Johne quereour
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in
tym to cum ffor the quhilkis It was ordanit be the saide assis' Ande euire
ony of the said' partiis happinis tile offend' tile vthir and beis conuict
tharof sale pay xx s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin and the said'
Johne querour tile sit one his kne and ask the said' Johne mvnk forgivnes

The secunde day of September the yer' of gode jM vc and fiwe
yeris Alexander Coupar burges of abirdene grantit him aving to Robert
harbotile Inglisman procurator tile the executoris of vmquhile Robert
Dvnhame Inglisman quhome god' assolye tuenty thre barrellis
of the Inglis' bynd' to be pait to the bringar of this Act at the
fest of the Natiuite of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsomir
nixt eftir follouing the dat of this act the Rassauor' of the said'
barrellis payand' to the saide Alexander tua schillingis scottis money
at the Resat of the said' barrellis
